sentences.en: ...a shop from which an uncle had sold hardware and timber.
sentences.cn: …一家叔叔曾经在那里卖五金器具和木材的店铺。

sentences.en: A DAU hardware block diagram is shown in Fig .3.
sentences.cn: 数据采集器DAU硬件的方框图如图3所示.

sentences.en: A DAU hardware block diagram is shown in Fig.
sentences.cn: 3.数据彩集器DAU硬件 的方框图如图3所示.

sentences.en: A hardware register containing the physical address of the system page table.
sentences.cn: 一种硬件寄存器,其中保存有系统页表的物理地址.

sentences.en: Do I have the hardware?
sentences.cn: 有必备的硬件设施么？

sentences.en: Hardware is the mechanical components of a computer.
sentences.cn: 硬件指的是计算机的机械部分.

sentences.en: Hardware stores have sold out of water pumps and tarpaulins.
sentences.cn: 五金店内水泵和防水油布已经卖光了。

sentences.en: He deals in hardware.
sentences.cn: 他做五金生意.

sentences.en: It is possible to reduce hardware cost by testing smaller - sized.
sentences.cn: 采用较小尺寸的试验发动机可以减少零件的费用.

sentences.en: Most manufacturers of hardware have a library of programs.
sentences.cn: 大多的硬件制造厂商具有程序库.

sentences.en: Over breakfast at my motel, I fell into conversation with the owner of a hardware shop.
sentences.cn: 我在汽车旅店吃早饭时，和一位五金店的老板聊了起来。

sentences.en: Some of them do have specific hardware and software requirements.
sentences.cn: 它们中有一些需要特定的硬件和软件。

sentences.en: That family has carried on a hardware business for five generations.
sentences.cn: 那家已经经营五金生意五代了.

sentences.en: The components are readily available in hardware shops.
sentences.cn: 这些零件很容易在五金商店买到。

sentences.en: The Israelis had made a preliminary request for hardware.
sentences.cn: 以色列人已经提出了关于供应重武器的初步要求.

sentences.en: The machine in hardware store can reproduce a key in two minutes.
sentences.cn: 以硬件存储的机器可在2分钟后复印出答案.

sentences.en: They deal in books, furniture, hardware and spices.
sentences.cn: 他们经销书籍 、 家具 、 五金、香料.

sentences.en: This software runs the basic operation; it tells the hardware what to do and how and when to do it.
sentences.cn: 这类软件执行计算机的一些基本操作；它告诉硬件要作些什么，如何做以及什么时候做。

sentences.en: Typical data for actual hardware are given in Ref. 436.
sentences.cn: 在参考文献(436)中给出实际产品典型数据.

sentences.en: 英文例句:To be totally secure, you need a piece of hardware that costs about $200.
sentences.cn: 为保证绝对安全，你需要一个花费约为两百美元的硬件。

phrases.tran_cn: 计算机硬件，电脑硬件；硬件
硬件体系结构，硬件总体结构

trans.tran_cn: 五金器具，计算机硬件，武器装备
trans.tran_en: computer machinery and equipment, as opposed to the programs that make computers work
